arts.ttl: Another Barcelona star ruled out of Elche meeting
arts.sum: Barcelona will be without the services of defensive star Andreas Christensen for the club’s upcoming meeting with Elche. This comes with the Dane yet to recover from a calf injury.…

arts.ttl: Two Barcelona stars to return for Elche clash
arts.sum: La Liga champions Barcelona are set to welcome both Robert Lewandowski and Dani Olmo back into the fold for their upcoming meeting with Elche. This comes amid confirmation that both…
